p.i: Woven from stingers, legs, abdomens, and wings, the crown wriggles with life.

description.p: Benefit You can summon a giant insect once per day. It acts on your turn and obeys your commands. It cannot speak to you unless you know its language. It serves you for 1 day. Determine what is summoned with the Swarmtide Crown Summoned Creature table.
Curse You are driven to take over the world using giant insects, replacing any previous personal objectives. You do not want to remove crown.
